name: iWebReader
tag_list: tts, cloud, saas, text-to-speech, voice, accessibility
overview: iWebReader is a high-tech service based on multiple-award-winning IVONA Text-To-Speech technology which allows website owners to voice-over web page content, making it more attractive and accessible to visitors. Thanks to this service, users can not only listen to selected text, but also download and save it as audio files. With iWebReader, you get access to all the voices and languages available in the IVONA suite of Internet services. The intuitive user interface and amazingly natural voices intensify the visitor’s experience of your website, while enhancing your brand.
